iiv.display

Class ShowPointController

  • java.lang.Object
    • iiv.display.ShowPointController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ShowPointControllerInterface, ShowPointDisplay, ShowPointTracker, iiVScriptable, java.awt.event.ContainerListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class ShowPointController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ContainerListener, ShowPointControllerInterface, ShowPointDisplay, iiVScriptable
    Dialog to display coordinate values and locations.
    Since:
    iiV1.0
    See Also:
    CNUDisplay

      • whichAreShowPointDisplays

        public java.util.Hashtable<ShowPointDisplay,ShowPointImage> whichAreShowPointDisplays(java.awt.Component[] components,
                                                                                      java.util.Hashtable<ShowPointDisplay,ShowPointImage> list)
        Creates vector of components or subcomponents that are also current show point displays.
        Parameters:
        components - array of components to search for show point displays in
        list - vector to add found show point displays to. If null a new vector will be created if any displays are found
        Returns:
        the input list or a new Vector with found displays added to it or null if no input list was null and no displays were found.

      • whichAreCrosshairTrackers

        public java.util.Vector<ShowPointImage> whichAreCrosshairTrackers(java.awt.Component[] components,
                                                                  java.util.Vector<ShowPointImage> list)
        Creates vector of components or subcomponents that are also current crosshair trackers.
        Parameters:
        components - array of components to search for crosshair trackers in
        list - vector to add found crosshair trackers to. If null a new vector will be created if any crosshair trackers are found
        Returns:
        the input list or a new Vector with found crosshair trackers added to it or null if no input list was null and no crosshair trackers were found.

      • whichAreSliceTrackers

        public java.util.Vector<SliceNumbering> whichAreSliceTrackers(java.awt.Component[] components,
                                                              java.util.Vector<SliceNumbering> list)
        Creates vector of components or subcomponents that are also current slice trackers.
        Parameters:
        components - array of components to search for slice trackers in
        list - vector to add found slice trackers to. If null a new vector will be created if any slice trackers are found
        Returns:
        the input list or a new Vector with found slice trackers added to it or null if no input list was null and no slice trackers were found.

      • showPoint

        public boolean showPoint(int[] point,
                         double value,
                         double factor,
                         java.lang.String name)
        Displays information about a point.
        Specified by:
        showPoint in interface ShowPointDisplay
        Parameters:
        point - array of indices specifying the point location
        value - value of voxel at point location
        factor - quantification factor for voxel value
        name - name of object source of the voxel
        Returns:
        true if info displayed, false otherwise
        See Also:
        ShowPointDialog

      • showPoint

        public boolean showPoint(int[] point,
                         double value,
                         double factor,
                         java.lang.String name,
                         XYZDouble xyzpt,
                         java.lang.String mapName)
        Display information about a point including Talairach coordinates.
        Specified by:
        showPoint in interface ShowPointDisplay
        Parameters:
        point - array of indices specifying the point location
        value - value of voxel at point location
        factor - quantification factor for voxel value
        name - name of object source of the voxel
        xyzpt - point location in talairach coordinates
        mapName - name of map used convert to talairach coordinates
        Returns:
        true if info displayed, false otherwise
        See Also:
        ShowPointDialog, CoordinateMap
